TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
They needed a shelf for tomato soup.

What is that "kicksharing"? 
"Pay and show, who's the target?"
"Pay for a launch kick to help you run?"
"Lease your kicks for money?"

Kicksharing is every Martial arts movie out of the Asia's

Why do songs get stuck in your head?

Because music is an exploit parasiting on your brain cyclic structures.

Is Salem or Motherland: Fort Salem a real history? They contradict each other.

Neither. Aliens are the real culprits because the truth is out there.

 

Why can't I decide if I actually liked the movie A Quiet Place Part II?

Because it's not comfortable to shoot from inside the boiler.

(On the other hand. this again makes to think, why didn't they blow a petard in a barrel. If the human ears would be ringing for a minute, the supersensitive aliens would just crack their ear joints.)

 

If a mosquito had sucked the True Blood, would it become a truesquito?

maybe...

Is this speed?

No I am speed - Lightning McQueen

 

If you lie in bed at night without a single worry, should that worry you?

Depends on whom are you lying to, yourself or another person.  Maybe, it's better to be honest.

Will Tesla robots be better than humans?

No. they will explode regularly just as their creator intended, so they can get metric data.

Should Flying Squirrels pilot gliders?

Those of them, which land on the trees.

If there is annihilation, are there jennihilation, susihillation, casihilation, and emmihilation?

Yes and Johnihilation,  Paulihilation,  Georgeihilation and Ringoihilation.

If Einstein was correct then the slower I go, the less mass I should have, right?

Yes, and vice versa: the faster you go - the shorter you are,

Transformation of Lorentz. Equation of Poincare. Paradox of twins. Why theory of Einstein?

Because nobody liked Zweistein. Or Dreistein. Or Vierstein. Some people did know about Fünfstein and Sechsstein though.

If they call a flashlight a torch in England, what do they call torches?

On 7/9/2021 at 10:21 AM, BuranAce said:

How do i type

On a keyboard.

Why do ducks quack?

Because durks quark.

15 hours ago, Ben J. Kerman said:

If they call a flashlight a torch in England, what do they call torches?

The light which doesn't flash,

***

Why do they call a hand lamp flashlight? Can't they buy a normal lightbulb for it?

Edited August 22, 2021 by kerbiloid

Actually it is called a photon caster. And a normal lamp would require a really long extension cord or a very large supply of flammable fluid.

How do you know that going extremely fast will massively increase your mass if you have never been that fast?

Haven't you sitten down on the floor instead of chair? It makes to feel so heavy.

If one twin rides a carousel, while another one stands aside and waits for his turn, will the standing one become older than his twin due to the twin paradox?

No. because the Twin Paradox thought experiment is bunkem and not provable and Einstein's mechanical clock was slower simply by having to deal with more frictional forces, brought about through moving it, than the 1 standing still.

Does talking about this stuff make you glaze over and drip uncontrollably from the mouth?

<stares into space vacantly while drooling> <babbles incoherently>
 

whats going on and where am i?

025508232021

Edited August 23, 2021 by AlamoVampire

You are under my control.

Who, what, where, when, and why?

You, this, there, now, unknown.

What's the frequency Kenneth?

I don't know. Ask Kenneth or Gene Kerman.

Why does doing anything involving this thread hurt my head?

Because it's virtual.
The thread, I mean.

Was there a humankind before KSP?

Yesn't

Is this?
Is. Isn't this?
